price: 103. Iyagoo  Hoos u wada hadlaya oo isku leh: Ma aydaan joogin waxaan aheyn toban (maalmood adduunka).”
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
